channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8725] Add total time RPC call metrics
item.description:
Right now we have:

  • queueCallTime
    • exposes the ammount of time that a call is in the queue
  • processCallTime
    • exposes how long a call was processing

We don't have a stat for total time. It's pretty easy to think that the two metrics might not track together so getting a total time could be useful.
item.summary: Add total time RPC call metrics

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
